name: Biolight (studiokaboom)
description:
Things go south after you’re sent to investigate a distress signal broadcast from the governments’ genetics testing laboratory. You’ll need to use your wits and strength if you want to get out alive! 

Biolight is a top-down action adventure game that puts the player in the shoes of a government agent trying to find out what happened at a genetics testing laboratory. Using your rifle you must cut down hordes of mutated scientists and escaped test subjects. You’ll find key cards that unlock doors, allowing you to make your way through the laboratory to finish your investigation and get out alive. 

Play through five levels of the story mode or battle it out with hordes of enemies in the endless mode.
